oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Old Blue-Back Speller - 1953-11-28 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM's The Old Blue-Back Speller program, part 2. Originally broadcast 1953-11-28 at 11:00 am. Personnel include Tom Hanserd (announcer), Ira North (host), and Marvin Hughes (organ).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Spelling competition -- 'Word of the week' round of competition -- Drawing of prize winner -- Closing statement (Ira North) -- Closing statement (Tom Hanserd)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Old blue-back speller (Radio program); Hanserd, Tom; North, Ira; Hughes, Marvin
